title: Why do players bot farm?
body: There was summoner's rift game in particular where I have never encountered in my life where all player were staying at mid and playing like bots. Regardless, it was an easy win and I didn't see any point of it because they didn't defend top or bot lane.

replies.body:
Unfortunately there are quite a few bots in low level arams/bot games and now they are becoming more frequent in norms. Riot know about the issue and are actively tackling it. 

For now, you can do your part to tackle this problem by reporting suspected bot players in the post game screen. Do it under the option "cheating" and in the comment box put "botting".

The reason they do it is to farm IP and level up accounts so they can sell them.
